BaseGameLogic.createForecast (/unique_chucks/13/0x1de89382684ce5a99fc9d3d4b709706d6a013571.sol#736-776) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < games[_gameId].gameDate) (/unique_chucks/13/0x1de89382684ce5a99fc9d3d4b709706d6a013571.sol#743)

BaseGameLogic.getForecastCount (/unique_chucks/13/0x1de89382684ce5a99fc9d3d4b709706d6a013571.sol#856-881) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- games[forecasts[tokenForecasts[_tokenId][index]].gameId].gameDate < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/13/0x1de89382684ce5a99fc9d3d4b709706d6a013571.sol#870-871)

BaseGameLogic.getScore (/unique_chucks/13/0x1de89382684ce5a99fc9d3d4b709706d6a013571.sol#886-929) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- forecasts[_forecasts[_index]].forecastBlockNumber < _blockNumber && _gameForecast[forecasts[_forecasts[_index]].gameId] == 0 && block.timestamp > games[forecasts[_forecasts[_index]].gameId].gameDate (/unique_chucks/13/0x1de89382684ce5a99fc9d3d4b709706d6a013571.sol#898-919)

BaseGameLogic.calculateScore (/unique_chucks/13/0x1de89382684ce5a99fc9d3d4b709706d6a013571.sol#944-1010) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > games[_gameId].gameDate) (/unique_chucks/13/0x1de89382684ce5a99fc9d3d4b709706d6a013571.sol#949-950)
